thread.title: Great Job, Internet!: Everyone thinks John Legend looks like Arthur, because he does
thread.title_full: Great Job, Internet!: Everyone thinks John Legend looks like Arthur, because he does

author: Marah Eakin
title: Great Job, Internet!: Everyone thinks John Legend looks like Arthur, because he does
text:
Feb 22, 2017 10:17 AM John Legend (Photo: Photo by Theo Wargo/Getty Images), Arthur image via screencap John Legend (Photo: Photo by Theo Wargo/Getty Images), Arthur image via screencap Share Tweet 
Given that there are 6 billion people in the world, it makes perfect sense that somewhere out there, thereâ€™s probably someone that looks just like you. (Un)fortunately for John Legend, his doppelgÃ¤nger just happens to be cartoon aardvark Arthur. 
On Monday, Twitter user Emily Sowah started pointing out visual similarities between the bedimpled Legend and his childrenâ€™s book counterpart. Sowah believes the similarities are most striking when Arthur is without his big round glasses, though thatâ€™s probably just because we havenâ€™t seen Legend in a similar pair of specs. John Legend look like Arthur lowkey pic.twitter.com/bfeG3cYo4M â€” Emily Sowah (@sowahblanket) February 20, 2017 
Other Twitter users followed Sowahâ€™s example, tweeting photos of Legend in various Arthur-like regalia. @chrissyteigen John when you tell him he looks like Arthur pic.twitter.com/Ya76RMcgxz @jenevamonique1 @sowahblanket pic.twitter.com/cF416XgDNX â€” b s t f r n d â˜¥ ðŸ¥‘ (@bstfrnd__) February 20, 2017 
Thankfully, the meme even made its way back to Twitter hero and Legendâ€™s wife Chrissy Teigen, who used a popular Arthur meme to express Legendâ€™s distaste for being compared with a sweater-wearing cartoon nerd: John when you tell him he looks like Arthur pic.twitter.com/0NW3NDtAb1 â€” christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) February 21, 2017 
Legend even chimed in himself, claiming Arthur ignorance: @chrissyteigen I hadnâ€™t even heard of this Arthur character til now. Was he around when I was a kid? â€” John Legend (@johnlegend) February 21, 2017 
Fortunately for both Legend and his young daughter, Lunaâ€”who, it must be said, also looks a little bit like the very, very adorable aardvark herselfâ€” Arthur is available to stream on Amazon with a $4.99 a month PBS Kids subscription.
